title: Cape Lookout National Seashore: Oystercatchers & Island Health
body: Oystercatchers & Island Health       When islands are unhealthy, they don't run a fever. They stop being able to support life and the plant and animal species that depend on that island to survive have to find another place to live or they will die. That is why it is so important to make sure the islands of Cape Lookout National Seashore remain healthy!  Â                      You're Healthy, but How is Your Island? Islands are living ecosystems that can become unhealthy if they are not taken care of. Learn how the population size of American Oystercatchers helps scientists determine if the islands of Cape Lookout are healthy or not.  Duration:9 minutes, 25 seconds
